presentation.title: Opening up Your API Platform: Why and How
presentation.toc: An API platform is whatever your organization has in place to support API providers and API consumers. API platforms should be able to adjust to changing contexts and needs, and in order to do that they must be designed to be open and extensible. We take a look at why and how companies should open up their API platforms, and present four indicators to assess and guide your journey towards an open API platform. These open API platforms then can serve as a stable and yet constantly changing foundation for an organization's evolving API landscape.
